titles.title: For the relief of Chi Hsii Tsui, Jin Mie Tsui, Yim Whee Tsui, Yin Tao Tsui, and Yin Chao Tsui.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E741-742)
Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Law, Immigration, and Refugees.

bill.summary: 3/24/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the granting of visas and admission to the United States for permanent residence pursuant to the Immigration and Nationality Act to five named individuals.
